title: NewsBreak- Pound Spikes as Brexit Deal Reached, Say Johnson, Juncker
text:
NewsBreak- Pound Spikes as Brexit Deal Reached, Say Johnson, Juncker

Forex 54 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 05:42AM ET)

© Reuters. Investing.com - The pound rallied on Thursday after the European Union Commission President Jean-Claude Juncker and U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson both confirmed via twitter that a Brexit deal had been reached. jumped 0.8% to 1.2923 as of 5:40 AM ET (9:40 GMT). Gains were capped after Northern Ireland's Democratic Unionist Party said it remains opposed to the proposed agreement, which means it is unlikely to be passed by the U.K. Parliament. fell 0.3% to 0.8598.

NewsBreak- Pound Spikes as Brexit Deal Reached, Say Johnson, Juncker
